segments.text: What courses are you going to take next year ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I am certainly going to take chemistry and physics , but I haven't decided on the other subjects yet . I'd like to take English .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why are you going to take english with chemistry and physics ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Because I want to study english literature . but I think chemistry is better for getting a job .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course it depends on what you are going to do when you leave college . Have you beside what you are going to do when you graduated ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am going to be a , well , I hope to be a research chemist .
segments.speaker: S2
